additionalInformation.notes: In 1998, Paul Leroux was sentenced after pleading guilty to nine counts of gross indecency, and, was also found guilty of three counts indecent assault, one count of attempt to commit indecent assault and one count of attempted buggery. These convictions resulted from his employment as a supervisor at Grollier Hall from 1967 to 1979.

In Jan, 2004, Father Norbert Dufault, a former Principal of Beauval IRS, was covicted of eight counts of indecent assault on eight native girls during the 1950s and 1960s while he was a parish priest at Dillion, Saskatchewan and principal at Beauval, Saskatchewan. He was sentenced to two years in a Federal penitentiary.
